100217.<cs_pchero>は ドガに\n災いの鉄杭と グレイトフルロッドを\n渡した:
<cs_pchero> gave Doga the
Stake of Woe and the Grateful Rod!

100227.ドガは 災いの鉄杭と\nグレイトフルロッドを 組み合わせて\nたかえだツルハシを:
Doga combined the Stake of Woe and the
Grateful Rod to create the Tall Pickaxe!

100228.ドガは たかえだツルハシの先端を\n天井へ向けて スルスルと伸ばしていった。:
Doga raised the tip of the Tall Pickaxe
towards the ceiling.

100230.ドガは たかえだツルハシで\n頭上の一点を 迷いのない一撃で 突いた！:
Doga strikes a point above his head with a
mighty blow!

100231.すると 崩れた天井から ひと粒の\n美しい宝石が こぼれ落ちてきた……。:
Just then, a beautiful jewel falls from the
crumbling ceiling...

100235.「我らは 紅衣の悪夢団。\n ダークドレアム様の降臨を 望む者なり。:
Oi' mates. We're da' Redcoat Nightmares.
We wish for the return o' the mighty
Nokturnus.

100236.「刻印を刻まれし 供物よ。\n 我らが主のために その命を捧げよ！:
You sacrifice engraved with da' mark of our
Lord! Give up yer' lives for Him!

100238.「貴様っ……まだ ジャマをする気かぁっ！！: You... you're still trying to get in my way!

100241.<cs_pchero>は ドガに 刻印のこと\nそして 紅衣の悪夢団のことを 説:
<cs_pchero> explained to Doga about the
mark and the Red Nightmares.

100253.「やあ <pc> キミか。\n 古代呪文シャナクを 会得するには\n もう少し:
Oh, it's you, <pc>. It'll just
be a little longer until I've fully mastered
Sheen.

100258.「こっ これは……？\n 凝縮された魔力の かたまりなのか！？\n すさまじいチ:
W-wow, this is... a condensed mass of magical
energy?! It has a tremendous power inside!

100260.「なんてことだ……。<pc>の他にも\n 刻印を刻まれてしまった者が いたなんて:
How horrible... I can't believe that there are
others besides <pc> who were also
engraved with that mark.

100261.「なるほど。それで ボクの所へ来たのか……。:
I see. So that's why you came here to see
me...

100262.「いいだろう。ボクのシャナクの呪文で\n あなたの刻印を 必ず 消し去ってみせよ:
Fair enough. I'll make certain that my Sheen
spell erases your mark for good!

100263.「不浄なるものよ……。\n この世に けがれをもたらすものよ……。:
You who are impure, and bear a stain upon
this world...

100264.「我が言葉を聞き 鎮まりたまえ。\n 破邪の光にて 消え去りたまえ……。:
Hear and be appeased by my words. By this
sacred light, it shall be extinguished...

100275.「よう。ひさしぶり！\n あんたに 伝えたいことがあってよ。\n どうしても会い:
Yo! It's me again! Long time no see. I really
needed to see ya again since I had something
important to tell you.

100276.「あんた 覚えてるかな？\n オイラが あんたに託した 気持ち。\n 落盤事故で:
D'ya remember? How I felt when I kicked the
bucket too soon? I still feel awful about
dyin' in that rockfall...

100277.「オイラには 一緒に育った 兄貴がいた。\n 地面を掘るのが 大好きな オイラた:
Ya know, I had an older brother. We loved
digging where we could, and had a dream to
dig up a legendary treasure one day.

100278.「あんたには オイラに代わって 兄貴に会って\n 伝説のお宝探しに 協力してほし:
I wanted you to meet my brother and help him
find that treasure instead of me. My brother's
name... it's Doga.

100279.「オイラの願いを かなえてくれて……\n 兄貴とお宝を探してくれて ありがとう！:
I can't thank ya enough... for granting my
wish and finding that treasure with him.
That's all I really wanted...

100280.「これからは お前が掘りたかった分の穴も\n 全部まとめて 俺が掘ってやるって…:
"I'll dig all of the holes you wanted to
dig..." That's what you said, right, bro?

100281.「すまねえ 兄貴。ありがてえ ありがてえ……。\n これでもう 思い残すことは:
Sorry, bro... Thank you... thank you...
I finally have no more regrets...

100282.「あんたには ずいぶん 世話になったな。\n これからは オイラのことは 気にせ:
You've been such a good help to me.
I hope you'll be able to what it is you gotta
do now without worryin' about me.

100283.「これは オイラからのお礼だ。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだから\n:
Here, I want you to have this. It's the least
I can do. I hope it'll help ya somewhere
down the line.

100285.「それにしても さすがは兄貴だ。\n せっかく手に入れた お宝を\n あんなにも:
Man, that's so like you, bro... you're willing
to give up your treasure so easily.

100286.「きっと 兄貴は さらなるロマンを目指して\n これからも 夢中で突き進んでいく:
I'm sure he'll keep chasing his dreams for
whatever the next big thrill is. Chase those
big, big dreams of yours!

100287.「この先 どこかで 兄貴に出会ったら\n またチカラを 貸してやってくれよな。\:
If you run into him again, do me a favor and
help him out, will ya? Well... looks like I
better get going then.

100288.「達者でな エテーネの村の <pc>。\n オイラは 兄貴に負けねえよう\n あ:
Good luck, <pc> of Ethene
Village! Gotta keep diggin' holes here so I
can keep up with my brother!

100289.「いやあ ひさしぶり！\n あんたに 伝えたいことがあってね。\n どうしても会:
Heyyy, long time no see! I really wanted to
tell you something, so I came here to see you.

100290.「あんた 覚えてるかな？\n あたしが あんたに託した 気持ち。\n 落盤事故で:
Do you remember those feelings that I left
with you? I still feel pretty guilty about
dyin' from that rockfall...

100291.「あたしには 一緒に育った 兄ちゃんがいた。\n 地面を掘るのが 大好きな あた:
I had a brother who I grew up with. We loved
digging in the ground, and our dream was to
one day dig up a legendary treasure.

100292.「あんたには あたしに代わり 兄ちゃんに会って\n 伝説のお宝探しに 協力してほ:
I wanted you to meet my brother and help him
find that legendary treasure. You know him
already... he's Doga.

100293.「あたしの願いを かなえてくれて……\n 兄ちゃんとお宝を探してくれて ありがと:
Thanks for making my wish come true, and
helping him find that treasure! That one
thing's all I needed to see to be happy...

100294.「これからは お前が掘りたかった分の穴も\n 全部まとめて 俺が掘ってやるって…:
"I'll dig all of the holes you wanted to
dig..." That's what you said, right?

100295.「ごめんよ 兄ちゃん。ホントに ありがとう。\n これでもう 思い残すことは な:
Sorry, bro... thank you... so much. I have no
more regrets now...

100296.「あんたには ずいぶん 世話になったね。\n これからは あたしのことは 気にせ:
You've been such a big help to me. I want you
to go and do what you need to do without
worryin' about me anymore.

100297.「これは あたしからのお礼だよ。\n いつか きっと 何かの役に立つはずだから\:
This is my way of saying thanks. I'm sure
it'll be useful at some point, so please hold
onto it.

100300.「それにしても さすがは兄ちゃん。\n せっかく手に入れた お宝を\n あんなに:
Thats so like you... giving up that treasure
you found so easily.

100302.「きっと 兄ちゃんは さらなるロマンを目指して\n これからも 夢中で突き進んで:
My brother will surely keep on chasing his
dreams for the next big thrill. Keep those
dreams big!

100303.「この先 どこかで 兄ちゃんに出会ったら\n またチカラを 貸してあげてねぇ。\:
If you run into my brother again, you'll lend
him a hand again, won't you? Anyways... I
should probably get going.

100304.「達者でね エテーネの村の <pc>。\n あたしは 兄ちゃんに負けないよう\n:
So long, <pc> of Ethene
Village. I have to keep diggin' holes here
to keep up with my brother!

101997.「…………？\n なんだ お前は…………。: Huh? Who the heck are you?

101998.「俺はドワーフいちの 穴掘り師\n トレジャーハンターのドガ。\n お前の名は？:
Howdy, partner. Name's Doga. Treasure hunter
and one the best Dwarf diggers around.
And you are?

101999.「ほう <pc>……か。なるほどな。\n お前は ここへ宝探しにきた……\n っ:
<pc>, huh... Doesn't seem like
you're here to treasure hunt, am I right?

102000.「……なに？\n 最近 悪夢を見ていないか だと？\n ああ……もちろん 見てる:
Wha? You want to know if I've been having
nightmares? Well... yeah, of course I've been.

102001.「穴掘りという名の 終わりなき悪夢をな……。: A never-ending nightmare of digging holes...

102002.<if_woman>「思い起こせば 少年時代……。\n ガキの時分から 地面を掘:
I remember when I was little, I loved digging
stuff up. My <if_woman>sister<else>brother<endif> and I were obsessed with
going all over the place.

102003.「そしていつしか 当たり前のように\n 伝説のお宝を 掘り当てるという\n 大き:
And before I knew it, I naturally realized the
biggest dream of my heart was to dig up
legendary treasure...

102004.「伝説のお宝を 掘り当てるまでは\n 永遠に覚めない夢……。\n ああ……まさに:
A dream you'll never wake up from until ya
dig up that legendary treasure... Ah... a
nightmare indeed.

102005.「この 穴掘りという 最高のロマンは……な。:
Digging up holes is truly life's greatest
thrill...

102006.「ここ ナシームの洞くつの 忘れられた広間には\n 伝説のお宝 ナシームの魔眼が:
Here in Naseem's Cave lies a legendary
treasure: Naseem's Evil Eye.
I came here to dig it up.

102007.「しかし……お宝の場所は 突き止めたものの\n ワケあって 簡単には 掘ることが:
I did manage to locate where the treasure is,
but... for some reason, I can't dig it out.
Guess fate feels like testin' me...

102008.「ナシームの魔眼を 掘り出すためには\n この洞くつで 材料を調達し\n とある:
To dig it out, you have to come to this cave
and collect materials to make into a special
tool.

102009.「<%sEV_QUE_NAME0>から 災いの鉄杭を\n <%sEV_QUE_N:
We should be able to make it if we get a Stake
of Woe from a Corpse Corporal, and a Grateful
Rod from a Grim Keeper.

102010.「ここで出会ったのも 何かの縁だろう。\n ふたつの材料を手に入れて この先の\:
Must be some kinda coincidence that we ran
into each other here. Can you help me out by
grabbin' those materials for me?<yesno><close>

102011.「ああ……見せてやるぜ？\n 最高の悪夢ってヤツを な。:
Yeah... I'll show ya. I'll show ya the stuff
of nightmares.

102012.「<cs_pchero>か。\n 災いの鉄杭と グレイトフルロッドを\n 手に入:
Oh, hey. Looks like ya brought both of those
materials I asked for.

102013.「あの亡者どもには 俺も 手を焼いていた。\n それを あっさり倒してしまうとは:
I had a bit of trouble with those dead guys.
And you beat 'em so easily... you'd make a
pretty good hole digger.

102014.「さあ ふたつのアイテムを 渡してくれ。\n 約束通り 最高の悪夢を 見せてやる:
Alright, hand 'em over. As promised, I'll show
you the stuff of real nightmares.<yesno><close>

102015.「宝を目の前にして おのれの欲望を制する か。\n ……フッ。見上げたヤツだ。\:
You'd conquer your desires in front of
treasure? Hmph. You're someone I looked up to,
and I don't hate your willpower, but...

102016.「俺たちが 掘り出そうとしている\n お宝……ナシームの魔眼。\n こいつに秘め:
The treasure we are trying to dig up is
called Naseem's Evil Eye... Do you know the
legend behind it?

102017.「アラハギーロ王国に その名をとどろかせた\n いにしえの大魔法使い ナシーム。:
There was a great mage in the old days who
made a name for himself in Al-Ahagiro. His
name was Naseem. And that guy had a secret...

102018.「それは 自分の額に埋め込んだ 宝石。\n 莫大な魔力の込められた 美しい第三の:
He had a jewel stuck in his forehead. A
beautiful third eye that allowed him to
control amazing magic at will.

102019.「ある日 ナシームは 自分のアジトの洞くつから\n 外に出ようと 古代呪文ルーラ:
One day, Naseem cast the ancient spell known
as Zoom to leave the cave where he was hiding
away. And do you know what happened next?

102020.「勢いよく 飛び上がったナシームは\n 洞くつの天井で 強く頭をぶつけた！\n:
Naseem shot up so fast that he smashed his
head on the cave's ceiling! So hard, that
the jewel dislodged and got stuck there...

102021.「そのまま地面に たたきつけられたナシームは\n 薄れゆく意識の中 最期の呪文を:
After falling and hitting the ground, he cast
one last spell in his dying breath to
magically hide the jewel.

102022.「わが秘宝は 誰にも渡さぬ……と つぶやいて。:
He mumbled,
"No one shall have my treasure..."

102023.「消えたナシームの魔眼……\n 今まで何度となく 夢見る男たちが挑戦したが\n:
That hidden eye has been sought out by many a
treasure hunter. However, no one's been able
to dig it out.

102024.「だが……俺なら できる。\n コイツを手にした\n この 穴掘り師 ドガになら:
But I can do this... Doga the cave digger has
got this one in the bag!

102025.「……見切ったッ！\n そこだぁぁぁぁッ！！: Yee-haw! I see it! There it is!!

102026.「やったな <cs_pchero>！\n ああ ついに……\n ついに 伝説のお:
We did it, <cs_pchero>!
Yes... finally... finally...!
I got the legendary treasure!

102029.「やれやれ……あやうく お宝を掘り出した穴を\n 自分の命で 埋め合わせるところ:
Jeez louise... you almost gave up your life
just for that treasure. This whole test of
fate thing is relentless, I tell ya.

102030.「しかし この胸の刻印は いったいなんだ？\n それに さっきの赤マントの連中は:
But what the heck is up with this mark?
And who were those guys in red?

102031.「この刻印は ダークドレアムってのを\n 降臨させるための 供物の証だったのか。:
So you're telling me this mark is a sign of
an offering to bring back Nokturnus...

102032.「……なるほどな。\n しかし 刻印を消すなんてこと できるのか？\n 相当に強:
I see... but is it possible to get rid of it?
Seems like a pretty strong curse...

102033.「……ふむ。古代呪文シャナクか。\n そして その呪文を ふたたび唱えるには\n:
Hmm... an ancient spell called Sheen? And it
takes a lot of magical power to cast it?

102034.「だが それだけの魔力を \n どうやって 調達すればいいんだ……？: Where am I supposed to get that kind of power?

102035.「そうか <cs_pchero>！\n その ナシームの魔眼だ！: Oh, duh! We can use Naseem's Evil Eye!

102036.「莫大な魔力を宿した こいつを使えば\n 古代呪文も 発動できるかもしれない。\:
Since it holds an enormous amount of magic
power, we should be able to use it to cast
that spell, don'tcha think?

102037.「アサナギとやらは セレドの町の\n ガケ沿いの集会所に いるんだな。\n よし:
So, this Asanagi guy is in Celed at the
Cliffside Assembly Hall. Alrighty, then. Let's
go, <cs_pchero>!

102038.「……ん？ せっかく手に入れた お宝を\n そんな簡単に 手放してもいいのか……:
Huh? You're saying I shouldn't give up my
treasure so easily?

102039.「ああ……構わないさ。\n 掘り出してしまった後の 宝なんて\n もう 宝じゃな:
Well... it doesn't matter. Treasure isn't
treasure anymore once ya dig it up.

102040.「宝は 埋まっているからこそ 宝なんだ。\n 俺は 伝説のお宝という名のロマンを:
Treasure's treasure 'cuz it's buried. I want
to dig for the thrill of finding legendary
treasure...

102041.「ただ それだけの 夢見る男……なのさ。: That's all I am, just a guy with a dream...

102042.「俺は トレジャーハンターの ドガ。\n ドワーフいちの 穴掘り師さ。\n お前:
Howdy, partner. Name's Doga. Treasure hunter
and one the best Dwarf diggers around.
I need a favor from you.

102043.「さあ <pc>。\n 例のものを 渡してやってくれ。: Go on, <pc>. Give him the eye.

102044.「伝説のお宝 ナシームの魔眼。\n こいつの魔力を使って 古代呪文を唱え\n 俺:
It's the legendary treasure known as Naseem's
Evil Eye. I'd like ya to use its magic to
cast that one spell and get rid of this mark.

102045.「刻印は 無事に浄化されたようだな。\n 礼を言うぜ アサナギ。:
Looks like you managed to get rid of it.
Thanks a ton, Asanagi.

102046.「<pc>。お前には 心から感謝している。\n 数々の危機から 俺を救ってくれた:
I'm truly grateful to ya,
<pc>... you really saved my
behind. Thank you, really!

102047.「さて……ここいらで 俺は 旅立つとするか。\n 新たなロマンに 出会うための旅:
And with that, I'll be off... a journey to
find the next thrill. As long as there's
treasure to find, I can keep dreamin'.

102048.「……<pc>。俺は\n 共に 穴を掘った仲間を 忘れない。\n 共に 同じ夢を:
I'll never forget my friends who dug holes
with me and shared the same dream, too.
<pc>...

102049.<if_woman>「ああ……全部わかっていたよ。\n 確かに お前の身体は 俺:
Yeah... I already knew. I know for a fact that
your body belongs to my <if_woman>sister<else>brother<endif>.

102050.「しかし 心は…… その魂は\n すっかり 別人のものだってことに……な。:
But the heart, and... the soul...
That belongs to someone else... doesn't it?

102051.「ヘンな所で 律儀な あいつのことだ。\n 俺に合わせる顔がないとか 思ってるか:
They're polite, but in a weird way... <if_woman>she's<else>he's<endif>
probably too shy to look at me. But...

102052.「心配するな！\n これからは お前が掘りたかった分の穴も\n 全部まとめて 俺:
No worries! I'll dig all those holes that you
wanted to dig.

102053.「もしも あいつに会うことがあったら\n そう 伝えておいてくれ。:
If you ever see <if_woman>her<else>him<endif>,
tell 'em that for me.

114714.「……面白い冗談だが 今は 笑えないな。\n なあ ふたつの材料を手に入れて こ:
...you know, jokes are supposed to funny. So,
can I count on you to get those materials for
me?<yesno><close>

114715.「よし……やろう！ 俺たち ふたりでなら\n この運命の試練も 乗り越えられるさ:
All right! I'm sure we can get through this
with the two of us. I'll be waitin' for ya
in the Forgotten Hall.

114716.<if_woman>「だって 俺たちは……\n ふたりきりの 兄妹じゃないか。<:
That's 'cuz, the two of us... we'll always be
<if_woman>brother and sister<else>brothers<endif>.
